import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { useNavigation } from 'react-navi' import { createOne } from '../api/order.api' type Inputs = { name: string email: string street: string city: string country: string zip: number number: string date: string cvc: number } const CheckoutForm: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const fullName = localStorage.getItem('name_key') as string const emails = localStorage.getItem('email_key') as string const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm() const navigation = useNavigation() const [{ name, email, street, city, country, zip, card, date, cvc }, setRegisterData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', street: '', city: '', country: '', zip: 0, card: '', date: '', cvc: 0, }) const onSubmit: (data: Inputs) => void = (data: Inputs) => { console.log('data', data) createOne({ name, email, street, city, country, zip, card, date, cvc, }).then(() => { console.log('Created') }) navigation.navigate('/success').then(() => { console.log('Navigated') }) } return (

Checkout

setRegisterData({ name: event.target.value, email, street, city, country, zip, card, date, cvc, }) } className="appearance-none block w-full text-gray-700 border border-gray-400 rounded py-3 px-4 leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:bg-white focus:border-gray-700" defaultValue={fullName} placeholder="Name" type="text" id="name" name="name" ref={register({ required: true })} /> {errors.name && errors.name.type === 'required' && ( )}
setRegisterData({ name, email: event.target.value, street, city, country, zip, card, date, cvc, }) } className="appearance-none block w-full text-gray-700 border border-gray-400 rounded py-3 px-4 leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:bg-white focus:border-gray-700" defaultValue={emails} placeholder="E-mail" type="email" id="email" name="email" ref={register({ required: true })} /> {errors.email && errors.email.type === 'required' && ( )}
setRegisterData({ name, email, street: event.targer.value, city, country, zip, card, date, cvc, }) } className="appearance-none block w-full text-gray-700 border border-gray-400 rounded py-3 px-4 leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:bg-white focus:border-gray-700" placeholder="Street" type="text" id="street" name="street" ref={register({ required: true })} /> {errors.street && errors.street.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.city && errors.city.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.country && errors.country.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.zip && errors.zip.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.number && errors.number.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.date && errors.date.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.cvc && errors.cvc.type === 'required' && ( )}
) } export default CheckoutForm
